body_html: Now I tried installing via pip -install -user tensorflow-gpu as suggested, but after running the activate tensorflow-gpu command I receive this error source activate envname which I enter and still nothing?

body: Now I tried installing via `pip -install -user tensorflow-gpu` as suggested, but after running the `activate tensorflow-gpu` command I receive this error `source activate envname` which I enter and still nothing?
